translations.translation: And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,
and casts out what is within it and is emptied,
and throws out of itself all that it contains
And it unburdens itself of all that is in it, and becomes empty.
And has cast out all that was in it and became empty.
And casts forth what is in it and becomes empty,
and casts forth what is in it, and voids itself,
And hath cast out all that was in her, and is empty
and casts out all that is within it and becomes empty;
And shall cast forth that which is therein, and shall become empty.
and throws out what is in it, emptying itself,
And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty,
And has cast out all that was in it and became empty,
and casts out all that is within and voids itself,
And casts out what is in it, and becomes empty.
And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
[84:4] and casts out all that is in it, of the dead, onto its surface, and empties itself, thereof,
(And hath cast out all that was in her) of corpses and treasures, (and is empty) from all of that

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ } معناه أَخرجتْ ما فيهَا من المَوتى

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَلْقَتْ } أخرجت فظهرت { مَا فِيهَا } من التقوى المودعة القابلة لفيضان أنوار الذات { وَتَخَلَّتْ } [الانشقاق: 4] عن حفظ الأمانات بالإلهية

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وألقتْ ما فيها } أي: رمت ما في جوفها من الموتى والكنوز، كقوله تعالى:

[الزلزلة:2]
 { وتخلتْ } منها فلم يبقَ في جوفها شيء، وذلك ما يُؤذن بعِظَم الأمر، كما تلقي الحامل ما في بطنها قبل الوضع
